document_data.title: Boo's Astral Menagerie
document_data.author: [[Christopher Perkins]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Boo's Astral Menagerie''' is a bestiary included in the ''[[Spelljammer: Adventures in Space]]'' boxed set.
